product_name: Benchmade 551 Griptilian Serrated Locking Knife - Sand
long_description: Get a grip on this extremely sharp knife, featuring a partially serrated, black-coated blade, molded handle and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism. 154 CM stainless-steel combination blade is strong and sharp enough to slice through food, wire and ropes with ease. The strong, spring-loaded AXIS locking mechanism adjusts smoothly for ease of operation. Ambidextrous blade is keenly unleashed with a simple push of the thumb-stud openers. Molded nylon handle is lightweight and easy to grip. Reversible pocket clip makes storage and carry easy--just clip it on your pocket or belt and go! Silky carrying sheath included.
short_description: Get a grip on this extremely sharp knife, featuring a partially serrated, black-coated blade, molded handle and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism.
